description: The Renewal of Song: Metalepsis and the Christological Revision of Psalmody in Paul. Doctoral thesis, Durham University. SHEPHERD, CHARLES,EARL (2012) Theological Interpretation and Isaiah 53: A Study of Bernhard Duhm, Brevard Childs, and Alec Motyer.
title: The Renewal of Song: Metalepsis and the Christological Revision of Psalmody in Paul
